page.title: 03Wareham today l985 - 1
page.content: The development of Wareham today has spread well outside the old walls. If the area of Northport is included, half the town buildings are now outside it's ancient walls. During the l920's and 30's there was a lot of infilling. Within the walls, over{ {seventy percent of the buildings are {listed as being of special {architectural and historical interest. There is little industry within the town which is given mainly over to tourism. At Northport a small industrial estate has begun to flourish bringing in smaller businesses. The main offices of {East {China Clay}are situated in Wareham and are involved in the extraction of large quantities of clay. {Gravel {extraction}is also a major industry. Most of the local firms are involved in service industries.
